forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A good deal of sunshine. High 13C. Winds NE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A good deal of sunshine. High near 55F. NE winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning, overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain. High 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then cloudy with rain likely in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 57F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 57F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
